tool_description: Collects real-time and historical price data for specified cryptocurrencies from multiple market data sources.

symbols.description: Cryptocurrency symbols to collect prices for

base_currency.description: Base currency for price quotes (USD, EUR, BTC)

include_historical.description: Whether to include historical price data

historical_days.description: Number of days of historical data to retrieve

error_messages: Symbol not found: One or more cryptocurrency symbols are not recognized by market data providers.
Unsupported base currency: Use supported base currencies like USD, EUR, or BTC.
Historical data limit exceeded: Reduce historical_days parameter or upgrade data plan.
Market data API unavailable: Primary market data source is temporarily unavailable.
usage: Provide symbols array with valid cryptocurrency symbols. Set base_currency as needed and configure historical data parameters. Returns current and optionally historical price data.

current_prices.description: Current market prices for requested symbols
